body.p:
To His Excellency Thos E. Bramlette
Govenor of Kentucky

Your petitioners respectfully represent that at the November term of the Graves Circuit Court 1862 William ,W, Sanderson was fined fifty dollars for Breach of the Peace also fifteen dollars for the Same offence Said Sanderson has behaved himself as a peacible quiet law abiding Citizen for the last two years, he has been badly and permanently cripled and has a wife & five children to Support and is very poor, has not the means or property to pay said fines we therefore most earnestly request your Excellency to Remit both of said fines.

A. R. Boon
Ervin Anderson
B, C, Howard
T. J. Puryear
H. Smith
Thos J Jones
J, A, McNutt
A, B, Gardner
W, B, Gee --
